channel.title: Website help!
channel.description:
Hi, im trying to add a shout box to one of my web pages. But when i paste the html code and save it, on the page the shoutbox doesnt come, only the code?
Anyone know whats wrong
The site can be seen here, the problem is under shoutbox.
www.death-scape.page.tl
